Stormcast2 (Age of Sigmar) [6,130pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Order - Stormcast Eternals) [6,130pts]

    • Leader [2,120pts]

      • Astreia Solbright [220pts]

        Categories: ASTREIA SOLBRIGHT, DRACOLINE, CELESTIAL, HUMAN, ORDER, HAMMERS OF SIGMAR, STORMCAST ETERNALS, SACROSANCT, HERO, WIZARD, LORD-ARCANUM, Leader

        Command Abilities: Soul Energy of the First Host, Magic: Astreia Solbright, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Lightning Pulse, Mystic Shield, Unit: Astreia Solbright, Unit Abilities: Cycle of the Storm, Mount, Prime Electrids, Spirit Flask, Supernatural Roar, Thunderous Pounce, Weapon: Aetherstave, Monstrous Claws


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Soul Energy of the First Host You can use this ability in your hero phase, your shooting phase, or the combat phase. Hero Phase: If you use this command ability in your hero phase, pick a friendly unit of HAMMERS OF SIGMAR EVOCATORS wholly within 12" of a friendly model with this command ability. That unit can automatically cast Empower in that hero phase (no casting roll is required, and the spell cannot be unbound). Shooting Phase: If you use this command ability in your shooting phase, pick a friendly unit of HAMMERS OF SIGMAR CASTIGATORS wholly within 12" of a friendly model with this command ability. You can use Aetheric Channelling to increase the accuracy and power of the unit's Thunderhead Greatbows in that shooting phase instead of choosing only one of those options. Combat Phase: If you use this command ability in the combat phase, pick a friendly unit of HAMMERS OF SIGMAR SEQUITORS wholly within 12" of a friendly model with this command ability. You can use Aetheric Channelling to increase the power of the unit's weapons and shields in that combat phase instead of choosing only one of those options.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Astreia Solbright 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Lightning Pulse
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Lightning Pulse 5If successfully cast, roll a dice for each enemy unti within 12" of the caster that is visible to them. On a 5+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Astreia Solbright 12"793+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Cycle of the Storm Once per turn, when a friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL model is slain within 18" of this model, instead of removing the slain model, you can heal 1 wound allocated to it. This model cannot use this ability on itself.
        Mount Astreia’s Dracoline, Kazra, attacks with its Monstrous Claws.
        Prime Electrids If this model successfully casts Arcane Bolt and it is not unbound, then the spell inflicts D3 mortal wounds instead of 1, or D6 mortal wounds instead of D3 if the casting roll was 10+.
        Spirit Flask Once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, you can say that this model will shatter 1, 2 or 3 spirit flasks. If you do so, each unit within 3" of this model suffers 1 mortal wound for each spirit flask that was shattered. Units with 10 or more models suffer D3 mortal wounds for each spirit flask that was shattered instead. Allocate the mortal wounds to this model last of all, after allocating them to any other units that are affected.
        Supernatural Roar Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units when they are within 3" of one or more friendly DRACOLINES.
        Thunderous Pounce You can re-roll charge rolls for this model. In addition, the Damage characteristic for this model's Monstrous Claws is D3 instead of 1 if this model made a charge move in the same turn.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Aetherstave Melee2"43+3+-1D3
        Monstrous Claws Melee1"33+3+-11

      • Aventis Firestrike, Magister of Hammerhal [340pts]

        Categories: AVENTIS FIRESTRIKE, ORDER, CELESTIAL, HUMAN, TAURALON, STORMCAST ETERNALS, HAMMERS OF SIGMAR, SACROSANCT, HERO, MONSTER, WIZARD, LORD-ARCANUM, Leader

        Command Abilities: Fiery Orator, Magic: Aventis Firestrike, Magister of Hammerhal, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Pyroelectric Blast, Unit: Aventis Firestrike, Magister of Hammerhal, Unit Abilities: Comet Trail, Cycle of the Storm, Fly, Meteoric Strike, Mount, Prime Electrids, Righteous Indignation, Spirit Flask, Thunderhead Crown, Weapon: Horns and Stamping Hooves, Staff of Hammerhal


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Fiery Orator You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick a friendly HAMMERS OF SIGMAR unit wholly within 12" of a friendly model with this command ability. Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by that unit until the end of that phase.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Aventis Firestrike, Magister of Hammerhal 2/2Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Pyroelectric Blast
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Pyroelectric Blast 6If successfully cast, pick a point on the battlefield with 9" of the caster that is visible to them. Drawn an imaginary line 1mm wide between that point and the closest part of the caster. Each unit, apart from the caster, that has any models beneath this line suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Aventis Firestrike, Magister of Hammerhal 14"1093+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Comet Trail At the end of the movement phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit that has any models that this model passed across. You can add 1 to hit rolls made with missile weapons used by friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL units that target that unit in the same turn.
        Cycle of the Storm Once per turn, when a friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL model is slain within 18" of this model, instead of removing the slain model, you can heal 1 wound allocated to it. This model cannot use this ability on itself.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Meteoric Strike Roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 1" of this model after this model makes a charge move. On a 2+ that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Mount Aventis’ Tauralon, Loithar, attacks with its Horns and Stamping Hooves.
        Prime Electrids If this model successfully casts Arcane Bolt and it is not unbound, then the spell inflicts D3 mortal wounds instead of 1, or D6 mortal wounds instead of D3 if the casting roll was 10+.
        Righteous Indignation Each time a wound inflicted by a melee weapon is allocated to this model, roll a dice. On a 5+ the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Spirit Flask Once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, you can say that this model will shatter 1, 2 or 3 spirit flasks. If you do so, each unit within 3" of this model suffers 1 mortal wound for each spirit flask that was shattered. Units with 10 or more models suffer D3 mortal wounds for each spirit flask that was shattered instead. Allocate the mortal wounds to this model last of all, after allocating them to any other units that are affected.
        Thunderhead Crown In your hero phase, heal 1 wound allocated to this model.

        Stormsire 7If successfully cast, each enemy unit within 18" of the caster suffers 1 mortal wound. Enemy units within 6" of the caster suffer D3 mortal wounds instead. In addition, until your next hero phase, subtract 1 from run and charge rolls for enemy units while they are within 18" of the caster.

If you do so, each unit within 3" of this model suffers 1 mortal wound for each spirit flask that was shattered. Units with 10 or more models suffer D3 mortal wounds for each spirit flask that was shattered instead. Allocate the mortal wounds to this model last of all, after allocating them to any other units that are affected.
        Voidstorm Scroll Once per battle, when this model attempts to unbind a spell, instead of making an unbinding roll you can say this model is using its Voidstorm Scroll. If you do so, the spell is automatically unbound (do not roll the dice).

      • Celestant-Prime, Hammer of Sigmar [340pts]

        Categories: CELESTANT-PRIME, HERO, HUMAN, CELESTIAL, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, Leader

        Unit: Celestant-Prime, Hammer of Sigmar, Unit Abilities: Cometstrike Sceptre, Fly, Orrery of Celestial Fates, Retribution from On High, Weapon: Ghal Maraz, the Hammer of Sigmar


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Celestant-Prime, Hammer of Sigmar 12"8103+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Cometstrike Sceptre In your shooting phase, you can pick a point on the battlefield within 24" of this model that is visible to them. Each unit within D6" of that point suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Orrery of Celestial Fates Once per turn, you can change one of the following dice rolls to a roll of your choice. Apply any modifiers to the new roll: • One hit roll for an attack made by this model • One wound roll for an attack made by this model • One save roll for an attack that targets this model • One run roll for this model • One charge roll for this model • One roll that determines the range or number of mortal wounds for this model’s Cometstrike Sceptre
        Retribution from On High Instead of setting up this model on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up in the Heavens as a reserve unit. If you do so, at the end of your movement phase you must declare whether this model will remain in reserve or strike from the Heavens. If this model remains in reserve, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of Ghal Maraz until the end of the battle. If this model strikes from the Heavens, set this model up on the battlefield more than 9" from any enemy units. In addition, if this model strikes from the Heavens, until your next hero phase subtract 2 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 12" of this model.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Ghal Maraz, the Hammer of Sigmar Melee2"33+2+-33

        Damage Table: WoundTable0, WoundTable1, WoundTable2, WoundTable3, WoundTable4, Unit: Drakesworn Templar, Unit Abilities: Arcane Lineage, Cavernous Jaws, Fly, Lord of the Heavens, Mount, Rain of Stars, Roiling Thunderhead, Skybolt Bow, Sweeping Tail, Weapon: Great Claws

        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Arcane Lineage Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly WIZARDS while they are within 18" of this model. In addition, subtract 1 from casting rolls for enemy WIZARDS while they are within 18" of this model.
        Cavernous Jaws After this model makes a pile-in move, this model’s Stardrake can bite one or more enemy models with its cavernous jaws. The number of bites it can make is shown on the damage table above. For each bite, pick one enemy model within 3" of this model and roll a dice. If the roll is greater than that model’s Wounds characteristic, it is slain.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Lord of the Heavens At the start of your shooting phase, if this model is on the battlefield, it can either breathe a Roiling Thunderhead or call down a Rain of Stars.
        Mount This model’s Stardrake attacks with its Great Claws.
        Rain of Stars Pick up to D6 enemy units on the battlefield. Roll a dice for each unit you pick. On a 4+ that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Roiling Thunderhead Pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of this model that is visible to it. Roll a dice for each model in that unit that is within 18" of this model. For each 6+ that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Skybolt Bow If you score one or more hits on an enemy unit with this model’s Skybolt Bow, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by friendly DRACOTHIAN GUARD units that target that enemy unit until the end of that turn.
        Sweeping Tail Each time this model attacks, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of this model after all of this model’s attacks have been resolved. If the roll is less than the number of models in that enemy unit, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

      • Sequitors [130pts]

        Selections: 5 Sequitors [130pts]

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HUMAN, ORDER, SACROSANCT, STORMCAST ETERNALS, SEQUITORS, REDEEMER, Battleline

        Unit: Sequitor, Unit Abilities: Greatmace Blast, Sequitor Aetheric Channelling, Sequitor-Prime, Soulshields


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Sequitor 5"274+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Greatmace Blast If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Stormsmite Greatmace that targets a DAEMON or NIGHTHAUNT unit is 6, that attack inflicts D3 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
        Sequitor Aetheric Channelling At the start of the combat phase, you must say if this unit will channel aetheric power into its weapons or its shields. If you choose its weapons, you can re-roll failed hit rolls for attacks made by this unit in that combat phase. If you choose its shields, you can re-roll failed save rolls for attacks that target this unit in that combat phase (instead of only re-rolling save rolls of 1).
        Sequitor-Prime The leader of this unit is a Sequitor-Prime. A Sequitor-Prime can replace the unit’s weapon option with a Stormsmite Greatmace, in addition to any other models in the unit that can do so. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of a Sequitor-Prime’s melee weapon. If a Sequitor-Prime is armed with a Stormsmite Maul and Soulshield or Tempest Blade and Soulshield, they may also carry a Redemption Cache.
        Soulshields You can re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target this unit if any models from this unit are carrying a Soulshield.

        Fury of the Storm While this unit has 4 or more models, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s Thunderaxes. While this unit has 6 or more models, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic instead.
        Intolerable Damage If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a Dracoth’s Claws and Fangs is 6, that attack has a Damage characteristic of D6 instead of 1.
        Mount This unit’s Dracoths attack with their Claws and Fangs, and a Storm Blast.
        Sigmarite Shields You can re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target this unit if any models from this unit are carrying Sigmarite Shields.
        Storm Blast Dracoths can spit devastating bolts of lightning which blast open amid the enemy ranks, leaving warriors maimed and reeling. When a unit is hit by a Storm Blast, do not make a wound roll; instead, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Claws and Fangs Melee1"33+3+-11
        Storm Blast Missile12"14+***
        Thunderaxe Melee2"34+3+-12

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Stormcast Eternals

          Selections: Hammers of Sigmar

          Battle Trait: First to be Forged, Scions of the Storm, Shock and Awe, Stormhosts, Command Abilities: Soul of the Stormhost


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        First to be Forged Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly HAMMERS OF SIGMAR units.
        Scions of the Storm Instead of setting up a STORMCAST ETERNAL unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up in the Celestial Realm as a reserve unit. You can set up one reserve unit in the Celestial Realm for each unit you have set up on the battlefield. At the end of your movement phase, you can set up one or more of the reserve units in the Celestial Realm on the battlefield, more than 9" from any enemy units. Any reserve units in the Celestial Realm that are not set up on the battlefield before the start of the fourth battle round are slain.
        Shock and Awe Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL units that were set up on the battlefield during the same turn.
        Stormhosts If your army is a Stormcast Eternals army, you can give it a Stormhost keyword. All STORMCAST ETERNAL units in your army gain that keyword. If a model already has a Stormhost keyword, it cannot gain another one, but this does not prevent other units in your army from having a different Stormhost keyword. You can either choose one of the Stormhosts in the list, or choose another Stormhost you've read about or created yourself. If you choose from the list below, all units with that keyword benefit from the extra abilities listed for that Stormhost. If you choose a different Stormhost, simply pick the Stormhost that most closely matches the nature of your own Stormhost.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Soul of the Stormhost You can use this command ability when a friendly HAMMERS OF SIGMAR REDEEMER unit is destroyed. If you do so, roll a dice. On a 5+ a new unit identical to the one that was destroyed is added to your army. Set up the new unit anywhere on the battlefield, more than 9" from any enemy models. You cannot use this command ability more than once per phase. Battletome: Stormcast Eternals, Errata July 2018

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Stormcast Eternals

          Selections: Astral Templars

          Battle Trait: Beast Stalkers, Scions of the Storm, Shock and Awe, Stormhosts, Command Abilities: Cut off the Head


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Beast Stalkers Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by ASTRAL TEMPLARS units that target a MONSTER.
        Scions of the Storm Instead of setting up a STORMCAST ETERNAL unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up in the Celestial Realm as a reserve unit. You can set up one reserve unit in the Celestial Realm for each unit you have set up on the battlefield. At the end of your movement phase, you can set up one or more of the reserve units in the Celestial Realm on the battlefield, more than 9" from any enemy units. Any reserve units in the Celestial Realm that are not set up on the battlefield before the start of the fourth battle round are slain.
        Shock and Awe Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL units that were set up on the battlefield during the same turn.
        Stormhosts If your army is a Stormcast Eternals army, you can give it a Stormhost keyword. All STORMCAST ETERNAL units in your army gain that keyword. If a model already has a Stormhost keyword, it cannot gain another one, but this does not prevent other units in your army from having a different Stormhost keyword. You can either choose one of the Stormhosts in the list, or choose another Stormhost you've read about or created yourself. If you choose from the list below, all units with that keyword benefit from the extra abilities listed for that Stormhost. If you choose a different Stormhost, simply pick the Stormhost that most closely matches the nature of your own Stormhost.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Cut off the Head You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick an ASTRAL TEMPLARS unit that is wholly within 9" of a friendly ASTRAL TEMPLARS HERO, or wholly within 18" of a friendly ASTRAL TEMPLARS HERO that is a general. Until the end of that phase, add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by that unit that target a HERO.

        • Allegiance: Stormcast Eternals

          Selections: Celestial Vindicators

          Battle Trait: Driven by Vengeance, Scions of the Storm, Shock and Awe, Stormhosts, Command Abilities: Righteous Hatred


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Driven by Vengeance You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly CELESTIAL VINDICATORS units if they made a charge move in the same turn.
        Scions of the Storm Instead of setting up a STORMCAST ETERNAL unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up in the Celestial Realm as a reserve unit. You can set up one reserve unit in the Celestial Realm for each unit you have set up on the battlefield. At the end of your movement phase, you can set up one or more of the reserve units in the Celestial Realm on the battlefield, more than 9" from any enemy units. Any reserve units in the Celestial Realm that are not set up on the battlefield before the start of the fourth battle round are slain.
        Shock and Awe Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL units that were set up on the battlefield during the same turn.
        Stormhosts If your army is a Stormcast Eternals army, you can give it a Stormhost keyword. All STORMCAST ETERNAL units in your army gain that keyword. If a model already has a Stormhost keyword, it cannot gain another one, but this does not prevent other units in your army from having a different Stormhost keyword. You can either choose one of the Stormhosts in the list, or choose another Stormhost you've read about or created yourself. If you choose from the list below, all units with that keyword benefit from the extra abilities listed for that Stormhost. If you choose a different Stormhost, simply pick the Stormhost that most closely matches the nature of your own Stormhost.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Righteous Hatred You can use this command ability the start of the combat phase. If you do so, you pick a friendly CELESTIAL VINDICATORS unit wholly within 9" of a friendly CELESTIAL VINDICATORS HERO, or wholly within 18" of a friendly CELESTIAL VINDICATORS HERO that is a general. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that unit’s melee weapons until the end of that phase. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once per hero phase. Battletome: Stormcast Eternals, Errata July 2018

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Stormcast Eternals

          Selections: Tempest Lords

          Battle Trait: Grand Strategists, Scions of the Storm, Shock and Awe, Stormhosts, Command Abilities: Rousing Oratory


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Grand Strategists At the start of your hero phase, roll a dice. On a 4+ you receive 1 extra command point.
        Scions of the Storm Instead of setting up a STORMCAST ETERNAL unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up in the Celestial Realm as a reserve unit. You can set up one reserve unit in the Celestial Realm for each unit you have set up on the battlefield. At the end of your movement phase, you can set up one or more of the reserve units in the Celestial Realm on the battlefield, more than 9" from any enemy units. Any reserve units in the Celestial Realm that are not set up on the battlefield before the start of the fourth battle round are slain.
        Shock and Awe Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL units that were set up on the battlefield during the same turn.
        Stormhosts If your army is a Stormcast Eternals army, you can give it a Stormhost keyword. All STORMCAST ETERNAL units in your army gain that keyword. If a model already has a Stormhost keyword, it cannot gain another one, but this does not prevent other units in your army from having a different Stormhost keyword. You can either choose one of the Stormhosts in the list, or choose another Stormhost you've read about or created yourself. If you choose from the list below, all units with that keyword benefit from the extra abilities listed for that Stormhost. If you choose a different Stormhost, simply pick the Stormhost that most closely matches the nature of your own Stormhost.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Rousing Oratory You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick a friendly TEMPEST LORDS unit wholly within 9" of a friendly TEMPEST LORDS HERO, or wholly within 18" of a friendly TEMPEST LORDS HERO that is a general. You can reroll wound rolls of 1 for attacks made by that unit until your next hero phase.

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

    • Realm of Battle

      • Realm of Battle

        Selections: Battle: Hysh

        Categories: Realm of Battle

        Spell: Aetheric Net, Banishment, Exorcising Beam, Healing Glow, Light of Battle, Vengeful Illumination


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Aetheric Net 6If successfully cast, pick a point on the battlefield within 18" of the caster. Roll a dice for each unit (friend or foe) within 3" of that point. On a 4+ that unit suffers 1 mortal wound, and its Move characteristic is halved until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p78
        Banishment 8If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 12" of the caster that is visible to them. Your opponent must remove that unit from the battlefield and then set it up again, anywhere on the battlefield more than 24" from the caster and more than 9" from any other models from the caster’s army. Malign Sorcery; Errata, July 2018 p78
        Exorcising Beam 6If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 12" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If the enemy unit is a DAEMON or DEATH unit, it suffers D6 mortal wounds instead. Malign Sorcery p78
        Healing Glow 7If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 6" of the caster that is visible to them. Heal D3 wounds allocated to that unit. Malign Sorcery p78
        Light of Battle 5If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster. Do not take battleshock tests for that unit until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p78
        Vengeful Illumination 7If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with missile weapons that target that unit until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p78
